goals.active: Meet Eir at her Hoelbrak homestead.
goals.complete: I spoke with Eir and we set out to confront the Sons of Svanir leader, Vidkun. He may have a dragon minion on his side, but we have Minotaur himself. Together, we'll stop Vidkun's attacks on Minotaur and his kind.

goals.active: Deal with Vidkun and his dragon minion.
goals.complete: Along with Eir, Garm, and the Minotaur Spirit, I defeated Vidkun and his corrupted dragon minion.
